title: Newton's Method
text: The formula for the Newton's method is given by $$x_n=x_n-1-\frac{f{\left(x_n-1\right)}}{\operatorname{f'}\left(x_n-1\right)}$$.

title: Secant Method
text: The formula for the secant method is given by x_n=x_n-1-f(x_n-1)(((x_n-1-x_n-2)/(f(x_n-1)-f(x_n-2)).
speech: The formula for the secant method is given by x_n=x_n-1-f(x_n-1)(((x_n-1-x_n-2)/(f(x_n-1)-f(x_n-2)).
